entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Coral Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:26 a.m. CDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Drizzle, -2.1Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Coral Harbour Airport 12:00 PM EST Thursday 11 May 2023

Visibility: 13 km
Humidity: 100 %

entry.title: Thursday: Snow or freezing rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to snow this afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 50 gusting to 70 this afternoon. High plus 1. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then clearing. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Thursday 11 May 2023
